Network
Interface Messages

All Known Implementing Classes:
QuoridorClient, QuoridorServer
public interface Messages

The Messages interface will allow shared messaging guidelines for the client/server. If we ever encounter an error in understanding the protocol or the protocol is changed then we will be able to change the communication methods quickly.
